title: LEAGUE MEN NEED BODY HAIR

Graves just happens to have a pool party skin and he's the gritty dude.

Udyr not having body hair is BS tho he's a bear smh.

Perfection is appealing because it's desireable, whether that be in regards to physical attraction or in regards to personal desire. 

I mean there are also a significant amount of people who like their partner to be smoothly shaved, but that's not always relative to what is generally found attractive. People tend to make exceptions for their S.O 

Riot's direction is not too make 'sexualized' champions anymore. Which is honestly incredibly funny when you look at the skins department. 

Riot's direction is too make their champions marketable, and in the end that is most simply done through generic features and cliches, which are most often found attractive by the general populace. Hence Riot's new direction.
